mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tenant (companyName, companyPassword, companyTel, companyNum, sysName, companyEmail, registerTime, state, companyAddress, companylogoUrl) VALUES (#{companyName},#{companyPassword},#{companyTel},#{companyNum},#{sysName},#{companyEmail},#{registerTime},#{state},#{companyAddress},#{companylogoUrl})
